Lyric:
[by:越动听越虐心]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:16.95]Thanks for all those wide-eyed nights
[00:20.54]Dance and thrills and neon lights
[00:24.52]Drinking tall boys, getting high
[00:28.51]Thank you for everything
[00:32.06]Thanks for all those days like gold
[00:36.38]Sun across your bedroom floor
[00:40.57]Flashbacks from the night before
[00:44.40]Thank you for everything
[00:48.47]Those days came and went…
[00:52.54]Now we're so far from were we've been
[00:56.48]But in my head
[01:00.49]We're dancing in the dark again
[01:04.01]Time may pass by but, it can't take away
[01:10.93]All these golden moments, never fade
[01:18.93]
[01:24.68]Thanks for all the memories
[01:32.56]Thanks for all the memories (memories, memories)
[01:40.29]Thanks for all the memories (memories, memories)
[01:48.31]Thanks for all the memories
[01:51.55]
[02:25.65]Thanks for all the time we killed
[02:29.54]Cigarettes and scarlet pills
[02:33.62]Showing me a brave new world
[02:37.76]Thank you for everything
[02:41.30]Those days came and went
[02:45.08]Now we're so far from where we've been
[02:49.61]But in my head, we're dancing in the dark again
[02:57.24]And all that I can say (dancing in the dark again)
[03:06.30]All that I can say is…
[03:09.16]Thanks for all the memories
[03:12.75]
[03:19.32]Thanks for all the memories
